data: 12 people were killed in the largest wave of Russian missile strikes since July last year.
The meeting between Trump and Zelensky lasted for about 15 minutes.
topic: Trump and Zelensky Meeting on Ukraine Peace Deal
claims: Trump questioned Putin's interest in a peace deal.
Zelensky expressed hope for a ceasefire and lasting peace.
The meeting lasted about 15 minutes and was described as productive.
Trump suggested applying new sanctions on Russia.
Zelensky proposed compromises to advance peace talks.
The US has been applying more pressure on Ukraine regarding peace negotiations.
intent: To report on the discussions between Trump and Zelensky regarding the ongoing conflict in Ukraine and the potential for a peace deal.
